name: Tower Song
description:
Tower Song is a turn-based retro-fusion JRPG with engaging, strategy-heavy combat and multiple point-of-view characters for players to choose from!


  • No grinding, no random encounters
  • Level up by progressing the story quest
  • Proactively plan turns by previewing enemy's moves
  • Customize your class skills with impactful mods
  • Simple crafting system for player expression

Load your rifle, prepare your spells and sharpen your weapons. Tower Song is a pixel-art RPG where foes are deadly, and victory requires thoughtful strategy.


  • 10 - 15 hours of play time
  • Choose your own main character; recruit up to 3 more party members as you play
  • Traverse retro-inspired overworlds to access new areas
  • Explore pixel-art SNES style environments
  • Accessible difficulty modes to suit your preferences

Players choose one of four (planned) heroes for their journey: the rampaging fury, the cosmic witch and her cat familiar, the philosophical street fighter, or the Exosuit-piloting, spell-slinging technomancer. Note: The fury and technomancer are still in development during Early Access and are not yet playable.


Our heroes will journey overland across multiple biomes before descending into the mysterious Towers.

Can you stop the Tower Song and save Qadam? Or will you falter beneath the terrible Cycle?
